org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client

Interface DatabindValidationHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatabindView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabindViewImpl

    public interface DatabindValidationHandler
    This interface allows the (databind) view to handle the two possible validation events.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onValidationFailure(String property, ValidationMessage message)
      Notify the view of a invalid try to update a property on the model.
      void onValidationSuccess(String property, ValidationMessage message)
      Notify the view of a property updated on model.

    • Method Detail

      • onValidationFailure

        void onValidationFailure(String property,
                       @Nullable
                       ValidationMessage message)
        Notify the view of a invalid try to update a property on the model.
        Parameters:
        property - model's property id
        message - message from presenter

      • onValidationSuccess

        void onValidationSuccess(String property,
                       @Nullable
                       ValidationMessage message)
        Notify the view of a property updated on model.
        Parameters:
        property - model's property id
        message - message from presenter
